entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Rain mixed with snow this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
